title: The Timeless Child is Found
description: A Gallifreyan explorer named Tecteun finds a mysterious child at the foot of a gateway to another dimension. The child becomes the source of regeneration for Time Lord society.

title: The Doctor Leaves Gallifrey
description: The First Doctor, along with his granddaughter Susan, steals a faulty Type 40 TARDIS and flees his home planet of Gallifrey to explore the universe.

title: An Unearthly Child
description: The Doctor's journey begins when two schoolteachers, Ian and Barbara, follow his granddaughter Susan into the TARDIS, forcing him to take them on his travels.

title: First Encounter with the Daleks
description: The TARDIS crew lands on the planet Skaro, where the Doctor meets his most persistent and deadly enemies, the Daleks, for the first time.

title: The First Regeneration
description: After defeating the Cybermen on Mondas, the Doctor's weary body gives out, leading to his first-ever regeneration into a new form.

title: Trial and Exile
description: For interfering in the affairs of other races, the Second Doctor is put on trial by the Time Lords, forced to regenerate, and exiled to 20th-century Earth.

title: Exile on Earth Begins
description: The newly regenerated Third Doctor arrives on Earth, unable to use his TARDIS, and begins a reluctant partnership with the United Nations Intelligence Taskforce (UNIT).

title: Meeting the Master
description: The Doctor's arch-nemesis, the Master, a fellow renegade Time Lord, arrives on Earth, beginning a long history of conflict and rivalry.

title: Genesis of the Daleks
description: The Time Lords send the Fourth Doctor on a mission to Skaro at the moment of the Daleks' creation, tasking him with preventing their existence or altering their development to be less aggressive.

title: The Last Great Time War
description: A catastrophic conflict rages across time and space between the Time Lords of Gallifrey and the Dalek Empire. The Doctor fights in this war as a forgotten incarnation, the War Doctor.

title: The Series Revival
description: The Doctor, scarred by the Time War, returns to television screens, meeting new companion Rose Tyler and re-establishing his mission to protect Earth.

title: The Day of the Doctor
description: Three incarnations of the Doctor—the War, Tenth, and Eleventh—unite to rewrite their greatest regret, saving Gallifrey from destruction in the Time War by freezing it in a pocket universe.

title: Return to Gallifrey
description: After billions of years trapped in his confession dial, the Twelfth Doctor escapes and finally returns to his home planet of Gallifrey, only to become its new Lord President.

title: The Timeless Child Revealed
description: The Master reveals the hidden history of the Time Lords, showing the Doctor that she is the 'Timeless Child', the original source of regeneration, with countless forgotten lives.

title: The Bi-Generation
description: In a mythical event never seen before, the Doctor bi-generates instead of regenerating, allowing the Fourteenth Doctor to rest while the Fifteenth begins new adventures.
